page.title: 07Shopping
page.content: Nothing but bustle in shops and markets. eople pushing their way through the crowds to get to the counter they want,the queues get longer and longer and the shoppers get more and more angry. The music coming through the speakers in the supermarkets is just loud enough to hear but nobody takes any notice,they just worry about getting their shopping finished. In markets crowds are everywhere,there are so many you wouldn't think there were any stalls.The shoppers push their way round the market making their own way to different stalls.
